text: The Qatar national under-20 football team represents Qatar in international football completions. They have been to both the FIFA U-20 World Cup and the AFC U-20 Asian Cup. In 1981 they finished second at the tournament and hosted the 1995 edition. ==Competitive record== ===AFC U-19 Championship record=== Year Result Pld W D L GF GA 1980 Runners-up 4 2 1 1 4 4 1982 did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify 1985 did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify 1986 Fourth place 5 2 0 3 7 6 1988 Third place 5 3 1 1 12 5 1990 Fourth place 5 3 0 2 5 3 1992 Round 1 4 3 0 1 9 5 1994 Round 1 4 1 2 1 5 7 1996 Round 1 4 0 1 3 3 12 1998 Round 1 4 1 1 2 2 6 2000 did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify 2002 Round 1 3 1 0 2 7 8 2004 Quarter-finals 4 2 1 1 3 1 2006 did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify 2008 did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify 2010 did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify did not qualify 2012 Round 1 3 1 0 2 4 6 2014 Champions 6 5 1 0 14 6 2016 Round 1 3 1 1 1 2 4 2018 Semifinals 5 3 0 2 19 13 2023 Round 1 3 0 0 3 2 12 Total 15/21 62 28 9 25 98 98 === FIFA U-20 World Cup === Host nation(s) / Year Round 1977 to 1979 did not enter 1981 Runners-up 1983 to 1993 did not enter 1995 Group stage 1997 to 2013 did not qualify 2015 Group stage 2017 did not qualify 2019 Group stage 2023 did not qualify 2025 TBD * Red border color indicates tournament was held on home soil. ==References== Category:National under-20 football teams Category:National sports teams of Qatar Category:Football in Qatar
